title: New: Attu – Don't Sleep
body:
Photo: [Hollie Fernando](https://www.facebook.com/HollieFernandoPhotography?directed_target_id=0)

Having grown from the solo project of Stefan Antoinette to a fully fledged four piece, London’s **Attu** have returned with _Don’t Sleep_, the first single to be taken from their debut EP. A cleaner and more polished sound, it’s dreamy, whilst remaining engaging, not just simply floating by. The initial collection of tracks (A,B,C & D) felt like the trailer to something rather special, and _Don’t Sleep_ begins to bring the early potential to a form of realisation. Thanks to [DIY](http://www.thisisfakediy.co.uk/articles/news/premiere-listen-attu-stream-dont-sleep-single/) for the premiere.
